data.title: Motoi Sakuraba
data.text:
Artist Information

Name: Motoi Sakuraba (桜庭統)

Birth date: March 5th, 1965

Website: http://sakuraba-motion.com/

Profile

Motoi Sakuraba is a Japanese musician known for his numerous contributions in video games, including the Valkyrie Profile, Tales, Star Ocean, Golden Sun, Dark Souls, and Baten Kaitos series. Sakuraba usually composes progressive rock with complex rhythms, often including jazz-like improvisations. He is currently affiliated with the TEAM Entertainment label.

Trivia

All of Sakuraba's songs in the GuitarFreaks & DrumMania series have been EXTRA/ENCORE STAGE songs in their respective game.

BEMANI Songs
